name: miaoda-taro-react-starter
description: 开箱即用的基于Taro + React + Zustand + TailwindCSS + TypeScript的模板
author: miaoda-team

scripts.dev: echo This environment does not support running dev and build scripts. Do not attempt to run them. To validate code correctness, please run the lint script instead.
scripts.dev:h5: echo This environment does not support running dev and build scripts. Do not attempt to run them. To validate code correctness, please run the lint script instead.
scripts.dev:weapp: echo This environment does not support running dev and build scripts. Do not attempt to run them. To validate code correctness, please run the lint script instead.
scripts.build: echo This environment does not support running dev and build scripts. Do not attempt to run them. To validate code correctness, please run the lint script instead.
scripts.build:weapp: echo This environment does not support running dev and build scripts. Do not attempt to run them. To validate code correctness, please run the lint script instead.
scripts.lint: npx biome check --write --unsafe --diagnostic-level=error || true; tsgo -p tsconfig.check.json; ./scripts/checkAuth.sh; ./scripts/checkNavigation.sh; ./scripts/checkIconPath.sh; ./scripts/testBuild.sh
